welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Romiley, a charming town known for its picturesque countryside and historical landmarks. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore and soak up all that this beautiful place has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and efficient terminal with a focus on long-haul flights and premium airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.
